projects.title: Weather Dashboard w/ Full DevOps Pipeline
projects.description: CI/CD: Multi-stage Docker builds, GitHub Actions pipelines (test/lint/deploy), GHCR registry, API uptime monitoring. Multi-platform container images (amd64/arm64) with nginx reverse proxy, security headers, and automated GitHub Pages deployment. React + TypeScript frontend with OpenWeatherMap API integration.

projects.title: MERN Inventory System w/ DevOps
projects.description: CI/CD: Docker + GitHub Actions. Deployed to AWS EC2 with auto-backups and monitoring. Full-stack application with MongoDB backend and React frontend. Architecture diagram included.
